Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near Irving Park/Nashville
ShortDescription: Westbound 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve, Narragansett and Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve, Narragansett, then resume their normal route at Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Nashville.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #29 State Reroute near Lafayette/73rd Street
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted near Lafayette/73rd Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 73rd, Vincennes, 75th, Lafayette, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Lafayette/73rd Street.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
